subNodes.conversationText: She's gone. She's gone. I'll wither without her.
YOU. Why are you here? Have you come to mock me?
The death of the one who slew her.

"And what do you want
From vengeance?"
"And what do you want from wholeness?"
But the spirits were already gone.

An ancient witch had been standing by, invisible, as the spirits and their unwilling companion conversed. She left too, riding the night wind to her cottage.

She had heard enough. She knew what she had to do.
